fees.description: Other fees may apply. Information regarding fees is set out on our fees page powershop.com.au/fees
Reconnection fees may apply to re-energise a property and remove locks. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Fees may apply for a move in read. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.
Fees may apply for a move out read. The fee will be passed on from your distributor and may vary.

gasContract.terms: We do not issue paper bills and require a credit card or bank details. For more information in relation to Powershop and this offer, see full terms and conditions at: www.powershop.com.au/terms-and-conditions

discounts.description: $100 sign up credit is available to new and moving customers only, and is applied 90 days after your Powershop online account has become active. We will send you an email letting you know when youâ€™re officially a customer.

gasContract.variation: We may vary your prices at any time. If we vary your prices we'll give you advance notice, usually by email.

eligibility.information: Must be a new Powershop residential customer, or an existing Powershop residential customer who is moving premises, and taking up your first gas market contract with Powershop for the premises you switch. Plan only available via direct retailer sign-up. For full terms, see powershop.com.au/customer-terms-and-conditions/energy-offers-terms-and-conditions

gasContract.onExpiryDescription: This Powershop offer is an ongoing contract (until you or we end it) with no exit fees.
